verses.verse: Be you <S%G3402>followers<s%> of me, <S%G2531>even<s%> as I <S%G2504>also<s%> am of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G1867>praise<s%> you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that you <S%G3415>remember<s%> me in <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and <S%G2722>keep<s%> the <S%G3862>ordinances,<s%> as I <S%G3860>delivered<s%> them to you.

But I <S%G2309>would<s%> have you <S%G1492>know,<s%> that the <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> and the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1135>woman<s%> is the <S%G435>man;<s%> and the <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4395>prophesying,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G2596>covered,<s%> <S%G2617>dishonors<s%> his <S%G2776>head.<s%>

But <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> that <S%G4336>prays<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4395>prophesies<s%> with her <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G177>uncovered<s%> <S%G2617>dishonors<s%> her <S%G2776>head:<s%> for that is <S%G2532>even<s%> all <S%G1520>one<s%> as if she were <S%G3587>shaven.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> be not <S%G2619>covered,<s%> let her <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G2751>shorn:<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> it be a <S%G149>shame<s%> for a <S%G1135>woman<s%> to be <S%G2751>shorn<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3587>shaven,<s%> let her be <S%G2619>covered.<s%>

For a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> not to <S%G2619>cover<s%> his <S%G2776>head,<s%> for as much as he is the <S%G1504>image<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> but the <S%G1135>woman<s%> is the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G435>man.<s%>
For the <S%G435>man<s%> is not of the <S%G1135>woman:<s%> but the <S%G1135>woman<s%> of the <S%G435>man.<s%>
<S%G2542>Neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> was the <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> for the <S%G1135>woman;<s%> but the <S%G1135>woman<s%> for the <S%G435>man.<s%>

For <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> her <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G32>angels.<s%>

<S%G4133>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> is the <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G435>man,<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
For as the <S%G1135>woman<s%> is of the <S%G435>man,<s%> even <S%G3779>so<s%> is the <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> by the <S%G1135>woman;<s%> but <S%G3956>all<s%> things of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G2919>Judge<s%> in <S%G5213>yourselves:<s%> <S%G846><s%> is it <S%G4241>comely<s%> that a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G177>uncovered?<s%>

Does not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G5449>nature<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> you, that, <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> have <S%G2863>long<s%> <S%G2863>hair,<s%> it is a <S%G819>shame<s%> to him?
But <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> have <S%G2863>long<s%> <S%G2863>hair,<s%> it is a <S%G1391>glory<s%> to her: for her <S%G2864>hair<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> her for a <S%G4018>covering.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G1380>seem<s%> to be <S%G5380>contentious,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G4914>custom,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> in <S%G5124>this<s%> that I <S%G3853>declare<s%> to you I <S%G1867>praise<s%> you not, that you <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> not for the <S%G2909>better,<s%> but for the <S%G2276>worse.<s%>

For <S%G4412>first<s%> of all, when you <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> in the <S%G1577>church,<s%> I <S%G191>hear<s%> that there be <S%G4978>divisions<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you; and I <S%G3313>partly<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> it.

For there <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G139>heresies<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, that they which are <S%G1384>approved<s%> may be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5318>manifest<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you.

When you <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> <S%G3588>one<s%> <S%G846><s%> place, this is not to <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G2960>Lord's<s%> <S%G1173>supper.<s%>

For in <S%G5315>eating<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> one <S%G4301>takes<s%> <S%G4301>before<s%> other his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1173>supper:<s%> and <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> is <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> and <S%G3739>another<s%> is <S%G3184>drunken.<s%>

<S%G1063>What?<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> you not <S%G3614>houses<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%> and to <S%G4095>drink<s%> in? <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2706>despise<s%> you the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G2617>shame<s%> them that <S%G2192>have<s%> not? <S%G5101>What<s%> shall I <S%G2036>say<s%> to you? shall I <S%G1867>praise<s%> you in <S%G5129>this?<s%> I <S%G1867>praise<s%> you not.

For I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3880>received<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> I <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to you, That the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> he was <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>bread:<s%>

And when he had given <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> he <S%G2806>broke<s%> it, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2983>Take,<s%> <S%G5315>eat:<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> is my <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2806>broken<s%> for you: <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> in <S%G364>remembrance<s%> of me.

<S%G5615>After<s%> the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G5615>manner<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he took the <S%G4221>cup,<s%> <S%G3326>when<s%> he had <S%G1172>supped,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> is the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>testament<s%> in my <S%G129>blood:<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> you, as <S%G3740>oft<s%> as you drink <S%G4095><s%> it, in <S%G364>remembrance<s%> of me.

For as <S%G3740>often<s%> as you <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4221>cup,<s%> you do <S%G2605>show<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord's<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G891>till<s%> <S%G3757><s%> he <S%G2064>come.<s%>

<S%G5620>Why<s%> <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G371>unworthily,<s%> shall be <S%G1777>guilty<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> and <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
But let a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1381>examine<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> let him <S%G2068>eat<s%> of that <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> of that <S%G4221>cup.<s%>

For he that <S%G2068>eats<s%> and <S%G4095>drinks<s%> <S%G371>unworthily,<s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> and <S%G4095>drinks<s%> <S%G2917>damnation<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> not <S%G1252>discerning<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord's<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>
For <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> are <S%G770>weak<s%> and <S%G732>sickly<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, and <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G2837>sleep.<s%>
For <S%G1487>if<s%> we would <S%G1252>judge<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves,<s%> we should not be <S%G2919>judged.<s%>
But when we are <S%G2919>judged,<s%> we are <S%G3811>chastened<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that we should not be <S%G2632>condemned<s%> with the <S%G2889>world.<s%>
<S%G5620>Why,<s%> my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> when you <S%G4905>come<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> to <S%G5315>eat,<s%> <S%G1551>tarry<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> for <S%G240>another.<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3983>hunger,<s%> let him <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3624>home;<s%> that you <S%G4905>come<s%> not <S%G4905>together<s%> to <S%G2917>condemnation.<s%> And the <S%G3062>rest<s%> will I <S%G1299>set<s%> in <S%G1299>order<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> I <S%G2064>come.<s%>
